system.requirements:
Tier 2; Weapon Skill 45, Strength 45
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence
system.effect:
Whenever an Ally within 10 metres suffers Critical Damge because of an Enemy, the character increases the damage they inflict by the value of their Size Trait.
Ratlings (Size 3, Scrawny), Humans (Size 4, Average), Ogryns (Size 5, Hulking)

description.value: Whenever an Ally within 10 metres suffers Critical Damge because of an Enemy, the character increases the damage they inflict by the value of their Size Trait. Ratlings (Size 3, Scrawny), Humans (Size 4, Average), Ogryns (Size 5, Hulking)
